articles.author: Jamie Hale | The Oregonian/OregonLive
articles.title: Geminid meteor shower promises an amazing show. What are the chances of seeing it? - OregonLive
articles.description: Will Oregon have clear enough skies to see the strongest meteor shower of the year?
articles.content:
The strongest annual meteor shower on the calendar is back, but the question once again is whether anyone in Oregon will be able to see it.
The amazing Geminid meteor shower peaks the night of Dec. … [+2231 chars]
